text: Bim Bum Bam, (1982-2003), was an Italian children's and teens' television programme. Bim Bum Bam was produced by Alessandra Valeri Manera and created by Paolo Bonolis and Giancarlo Muratori. ==Mascotte== *Uan, the pink dog *Ambrogio, the lion ==Cartoons/Anime== *I Puffi (The Smurfs) (1982; 1993) *Kiss me Licia (1985; 1998; 2002) *Carletto il principe dei mostri (Kaibutsu- kun) (1983) *C'era una volta... Pollon (Poron) *L'incantevole Creamy (1985; 1995; 2001) *Snorky (Snorks) (1986) *Foofur Superstar (Foofur) (1987; 1996-97) *Teodoro e l'invenzione che non va (Wowser) (1989) *Cristoforo Colombo (1992) *Conte Dacula (Count Duckula) (1989) *Bentornato Topo Gigio (1992) *Calimero (1995) *Sailor Moon (1995-2000) *T-Rex (1994-95) *James Bond Junior (1994-95) *Mighty Max (1995) *L'ispettore Gadget (Inspector Gadget) (1994-95) *Tartarughe Ninja alla riscossa (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987 TV series)) (1994-95) *The Real Ghostbusters (1994-95) *Widget, un alieno per amico (Widget The World Watcher) (1993; 1996) *The Mask: The Animated Series (1996-97) *Scuola di polizia (Police Academy: The Animated Series) (1996; 2001) *La fabbrica dei mostri (Creepy Crawlers) *Iznogoud - Chi la fa l'aspetti (Iznogoud) (1996-97) *Mr. Magoo (1996-97) *Alf (1996-97) *Robinson Bign√® (Robinson Sucroe) (1996-97) *Ace Ventura (two episodes) (1996-97) *Casper (1998) *Sale e Pepe (Les Jules) (1998) *Pippi Calzelunghe (1998) *Braccio di Ferro (Popeye) (1999) *I gemelli del destino (Destiny Twins) (1999) *Alvin Show (Alvin and the Chipmunks) (1999) *Beethoven (Beethoven) (2000) *Pokemon (2000-2002) *Card Captor Sakura (1998-2000) Category:1982 television series debuts Category:Italian television series
